channel.title: research on Siga Beauty
channel.description: Recent content in research on Siga Beauty

item.title: Pretrained Foundation Models
item.description: ChatGPT shows great performance in few-shot and zero-shot conditions, it make researchers belive large pretrain model is the right path of AI future. PFM (Pretrained Foundation Models), a huge data based model as a base of difference downstream tasks. Some PFM like BERT, GPT-3, MAE, DALLE-E and the recently hot ChatGPT are well know PFM, which give good initial paramters for different downstream tasks. The pretrain technique behind PFM play an important rool in application of large AI models, different from deep feature learning like CNN and RNN, GPT use transformer for deep feature learning, and use auto regressive training with large dataset.

item.title: Review of Voice Activity Detection
item.description: In speech signal processing, auto speech recognition (ASR) is much well known than voice activity detection (VAD), because VAD a sub modual but not a full-application directly facing user interface. Indeed, VAD is very important in any production of speech data pre-processing. flowchart A(AUDIO) -- B(VAD) B -- C(ASR) B -- D(VPR) B -- E(SED) B -- F(etc...) Task Definition Voice activity detection is the task of looking for voice activity in an audio stream.
